title: UPLIFT | Tailored Software Solutions
description: We build custom CMS, POS, ERP and backend systems for real businesses.

story.title: Our Story | UPLIFT
story.description: Discover the journey of UPLIFT - from a vision to transform businesses through technology to becoming Thailand's premier custom software development company.

hero.title: Our Journey to Digital Excellence
hero.description: From a small idea to empowering businesses across Thailand with cutting-edge technology solutions.

company.title: Company History
company.subtitle: Building Tomorrow's Technology Today
company.description: UPLIFT was founded with a mission to bridge the gap between complex business needs and innovative technology solutions.

timeline.title: Scaling Excellence
timeline.content: Expanded our services to include AI-powered solutions and advanced analytics. Launched our proprietary ERP platform that now serves over 50+ businesses across Thailand. Achieved SOC 2 compliance and established partnerships with major cloud providers.

timeline.title: Market Leadership
timeline.content: Became the go-to solution provider for SMEs in Thailand. Developed our signature POS system that revolutionized retail operations for local businesses. Established our dedicated mobile app development division.

timeline.title: Foundation & Growth
timeline.content: UPLIFT was born from a vision to democratize enterprise-level technology for businesses of all sizes. Started with custom web development and quickly expanded to comprehensive digital solutions.

profile.name: Anon Suphatphon
profile.quote: Every business deserves technology that scales with their dreams, not limits them.
profile.bio: With over 8 years of experience in software development and business automation, Anon founded UPLIFT to bridge the gap between complex enterprise needs and accessible technology solutions. His vision transforms how Thai businesses leverage technology for growth.
background: Former Senior Developer at leading tech companies
Specialized in Enterprise Architecture & Cloud Solutions

items.title: Innovation First
items.description: We constantly push boundaries to deliver cutting-edge solutions that drive real business value.

items.title: Client Success
items.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to delivering solutions that exceed expectations.

items.title: Quality Excellence
items.description: Every line of code, every design decision, every user interaction is crafted with precision and care.

items.title: Scalable Solutions
items.description: We build systems that grow with your business, ensuring long-term value and sustainability.
